name: Military Weapons Training: Commando Camp
description:
Train yourself to be army commando sniper for Special Forces, as a great sniper elite commando you have to keep training hard to get have the skills you have to have for a commando sniper. In Military Weapons Training: Commando Camp you have to tackle with multiple advance weapons and skills to show and increase the shooting skills from far away. You have to complete the target shooting levels to complete most skillful sniper shooting training.
Military Weapons Training: Commando Camp is about shooting as many targets as you can in limited amount of time. If you can do both you will become a real Commando Sniper! If you like action-adventure, fun and addictive games – Sniper shooting is the game for you!
Military Weapons Training: Commando Camp Adventure is aiming to offer you an enjoyable time while playing it and it simulates a real battle against enemies. Now pick up your rifle, training room/ environment, breathe slowly, and search your targets. Crucial time to use your best sniper shooting skills wisely and latest long range sniper gun to kill enemy soldiers by taking clear shots. Be advised if your enemy is too close don’t miss your target. Take Clear head shot and bull’s-eye!

Game Feature:
• Real Sniper Target Shooting Environment
• Multiple Advance Sniper Weapons
• Challenging Training Missions
• Smooth and Easy controls
• Amazing 3D Graphics
• Thrilling Commando Sniper Shooting Exercise
